name: Count's Chain
description: A vampire-slayer lash cleaves a wider arc.

name: Holy Garlic Sigil
description: Consecrated vapors scorch foes nearby.

name: Runed Stakes
description: Silvered rounds pierce deeper and fly truer.

name: Night Brood
description: Summon ravenous bat familiars.

name: Mist Step
description: Active ability: blink in your movement direction.

name: Pale Doppel
description: Active ability: deploy a static gun-wielding clone.

name: Bone Rampart
description: Active ability: leave a wall trail for 5 seconds.

name: Twin Phylactery
description: Abilities gain +1 max charge for all unlocked slots.

name: Spectral Gait
description: Walk through and break walls for 10 seconds.

name: Tesla Musket Coils
description: Fallout-style overcharged rounds hit harder.

name: Ghoul Trigger Finger
description: Faster trigger cycles for all weapons.

name: Werewolf Tendons
description: Monstrous movement speed surge.

name: Necromancer Magnet
description: Soul shards fly in from farther away.

name: Franken Heart Stitch
description: Bolster maximum vitality and recover.

name: Wolf Sprint
description: Active ability: sprint for 6 seconds and phase through enemies.

name: Cataclysm Nova
description: Active ability: blast everything around you with a shockwave.

name: Blade Cyclone
description: Active ability: spinning melee storm around your body.

name: Dash Rampage
description: Active ability: hyper-dash and shred enemies on contact.

name: Glue Mire
description: Active ability: drop sticky slowing traps that deal damage.

name: Regression Hex
description: Active ability: downgrade enemy tiers by one rank.

name: Twin Relics
description: Active ability: use two weapons at once for 7 seconds.

name: Void Lance
description: Active ability: place piercing void lances in front of you.

name: Meteor Psalm
description: Active ability: call meteors onto enemy clusters.

name: Chrono Bubble
description: Active ability: slow enemies while you fire faster.

name: Stone Skin
description: Gain a one-time blue barrier shell before HP takes damage.

name: Blood Tax Rebate
description: Deal damage to siphon health back.

name: Headhunter Lens
description: Critical hits from precision fire.

name: Titan Plating
description: Flat damage reduction from incoming hits.

name: Ghost Stride
description: Faster movement between kill chains.

name: Vaulting Boots
description: Short bursts of evasive speed.

name: Bloodline Vigor
description: Rogue Legacy style hereditary toughness.

name: Hard Reset Reactor
description: Faster weapon cycling and trigger discipline.

name: Quick Hands
description: Borderlands reload-tech converted to fire cadence.

name: Boomer Core
description: Bigger payload in every shot.

name: Aristocrat Rounds
description: Expensive bullets, brutal impact.

name: Magnet Array
description: Vacuum nearby loot from farther away.

name: Echo Lure
description: Soul fragments spiral into you.

name: Berserk Circuit
description: Nuclear Throne style aggression boost.

name: Duelist Thread
description: Skirmisher wiring for pace and precision.

name: Grit
description: Reduce panic by buffering incoming damage.

name: Hardened Halo
description: A halo barrier around your body.

name: Grave Commerce
description: Killed foes are worth more cash.

name: Void Anatomy
description: Study weak points for amplified crit lethality.

name: Overclock Heart
description: Push your body for HP and weapon speed.
